website_summaries.verdict: The Huawei Honor 8 is a likable midprice phone with some extra perks, but its short battery life holds it back.
pros: Huawei's Honor 8 is a slick little package that combines good photos from a dual-lens camera with a useful customizable button and a fingerprint reader
And it's easy to use one-handed
cons: Battery life falls short and knuckle gestures are gimmicky

customer_reviews.title: Good and bright screen
customer_reviews.text: Good and bright screen. Solid battery life. UI is easily fixed with Google's Launcher and DPI can be changed via ADB if you'd like. Fast and useful--blows the nexus 5x out of the water in most respects and is a nice upgrade. Impressive build quality, nice set of features with EMU, and overall a solid phone. Downsides would include that the US version is SINGLE SIM and the reception for TMobile seems a tad spotty compared to other devices I've used. Overall it's a good phone, however, the downsides in my case make it harder to keep, and therefore I might have to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: J Martin

customer_reviews.title: It's a good phone that performs well but a year later it's ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good phone that performs well but a year later it's now shutting down with 20% left on the battery, as if it's completely depleted. One year isn't a particularly good return on the investment since it hasn't been abused. Update: Lasted about 2 years before it would hold no usable charge. Had a repair shop install a new battery and it's great again. It's such a good phone at the original price point (not the new inflated prices) that I didn't find anything worth the cost. If I get another 2 years I'll be thrilled. Maybe two more with yet another battery? Who knows. My needs in a phone have plateaued.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hockenberry

customer_reviews.title: Great device. Coming off of an S8 and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great device. Coming off of an S8 and it holds up very well comparably. I did lose out on water resistance but I gained an ir blaster. Build of device is very good and performance is flawless. I have experienced a few stutters on the s8 and the hardware bloat with the bixby button as well as not being able to reassign it were one of the reasons I chose to part with the device. The Honor 8 is wonderful and I'd definitely recommend it. 4 Star rating due to device arriving with a dead pixel on screen, otherwise everything is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal W.

customer_reviews.title: but everything else is fine. It's a very slim design
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for about 2 months, unfortunately got a crack in the corner (mostly my own fault, but maybe some design flaw as well), but everything else is fine. It's a very slim design, fingerprint unlocks easily, and runs pretty fast on most apps. The only downside might be that if you have a micro SD card like me, you can't move apps onto it. Also, it's been complaining about my SD card being damaged for some reason (although there are still 2.5 GB left in memory on the card). It might be a card problem, but it's something to keep an eye on. Overall it's a great phone at this price. Love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: May Z.

customer_reviews.title: Bye-bye iPhone! Hello Honor!
customer_reviews.text: This was my third Android phone after breaking up with Apple. I hated my first two Blu phones. I'm in LOVE with Honor 8! It's fast and takes wonderful pictures and video. With a bunch of kids moving about, it still captures crisp images with good lighting. If you want to lose the iPhone and save hundreds of dollars, buy this. Buy it now.
customer_reviews.author: FourBoyMom

customer_reviews.title: Honor GR8
customer_reviews.text: This is a 5 star shooter. I have used this phone for a few months now and it is still a powerhouse of a device! Since I purchased, it has gotten Nougat, the latest Android Os and Updates to Huawei's Shell overlay EMUI 5 and it handles it all like a champ. Battery life has not seemed to diminish at all... still getting 2.5 - 3 days on a charge. But the real bang for the buck is the Camera. It is wonderful. Operates in low light quite well. I'll attache a few pics... some I used the built in filters, some not.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mooneyham

customer_reviews.title: and it pretty much replaces everything
customer_reviews.text: I use an iPhone mainly for business because it syncs with my iPad & the Mac. My main iPhone App is "Tap-Forms" (couldn't imagine working without it, noting else out there does what it does, and it pretty much replaces everything. Nothing Google touches the TapForms App). Bought the Honor Android to check our web site development projects on the Android platform. Does the job, nice screen, fast, sleek, great camera... will only be using it over WiFi. No plans to turn on a phone number. Good phone for what I wanna do.
customer_reviews.author: oneminuteblues

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have this phone as my daily driver for over 6 months and love it. EMUI gives it an "iPhone" look but a launcher can change that, plus EMUI can be changed to have an app drawer. I have no complaints with it. I'm gonna use this for another year before I get another cheap Huawei phone. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: What Sammy did to apple what Huawei is doing to them. Win win for customers.
customer_reviews.text: What a great device for the money. Been a Samsung fanboy for a while and decided to broaden my horizons. Glad I did. Huawei, please keep up the good work and continue to get bigger and better but don't lose touch with customers when you reach your goals and stay true to your principles. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Knobson D'Mong

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone at a solid price
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone at a solid price. I'm not an overly picky person and I really didn't wanna spend a thousand dollars on a new phone so I went from a hundred dollar go phone to this one and for me there is a noticeable difference. PROS - Finger print scanner works great - clear picture - pretty fast - good battery life - battery charges super fast - good camera CONS - id photos for contacts don't always load correctly - scrolling through group messages skips - phone heats up after use but not as bad as some people have made it out to be
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pronounce easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great phone at a good price! The phone is fast and smooth. Works great and looks good, have had many people comment on it. Love the fingerprint scanner. Works for me every time. Camera works great and phone easily handles all my apps. Snapchat, Instagram, Google maps all work without any problem. I did a lot of research and read many reviews before buying this phone and have been very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Please help
customer_reviews.text: Does anyone know how I can remove this pop up box from popping up when I record stuff. It's getting annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal for an awesome phone.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This phone came in perfect condition just like the seller stated. Phone is incredible after 4 days of use. Hasn't slowed down at all. Camera is beautiful and battery life has been more than adequate. Will most likely buy another one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Phill1728

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this phone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this phone. It's fast, upgraded to Nougat just as soon as I fired it up, plenty of space (64GB internal plus 128GB card). Best Android phone I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Break With the Herd. This Brand Won't Let You Down.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the latest Smart phone without breaking the bank and I got it in this phone. It is ultra-thin and with its all-glass design you feel like you are holding a work of art. The battery life is excellent. It has Huawei's branded Android system, which appeals not only to die-hard Android users, but is welcoming to former iPhone fanatics. Save some cash and still stay in the game with this beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy new, not used. Received a defective device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone from Amazon warehouse deals because it said like new with no scratches or cracks. It came with an inspected sticker & all. But the phone is defective I've done 4 factory resets & the fingerprint sensor doesn't work. The option in settings isn't even there so it must be a hardware problem. I'm so sad because I bought it for work use & the fingerprint gesture features were a part of it. I'm very upset but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Krack Kobain

customer_reviews.title: This phone is awesome!! the hardware is really great
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome!! the hardware is really great. software could be better but after tweaking it a little it really does the trick. wish it had Double tap to wake cause I really got used to having it but for the price I paid (240$ on Black Friday) can't complain at all!
customer_reviews.author: Tom O.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a quality phone
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this phone for 5 months, and it has been great. Still works as well as the day I bought it. All apps run fast and smooth and don't crash. EMUI software is great overall. Hardware feels very sturdy and looks great. The only thing that I don't like is the video camera, but at this price, I can't fault it too much. This phone is a way better value than iPhones or Galaxies. For the same price, you can buy this and a nice $500 camera.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: This is a much better phone. The resolution is good enough
customer_reviews.text: The phone is light, the fingerprint button is really responsive and fast. The processing power is fast as well. I am coming from a Galaxy S3. This is a much better phone. The resolution is good enough. I don't want to spend double on better resolution. This is the best deal for the price. Also, the camera is really great. The front facing camera is just as clear as the back facing camera. The device could have better feel to it because surface seems to be all glass. A metal touch would make it feel solid. A great device.
customer_reviews.author: orj45o-sp4m

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PHONE
customer_reviews.text: One of the best phone I have ever had. I am not sure why still people go for iPhone and Samsung when you can have such a great phone for less than half of the price. It's flawless. Things that I liked about these are. 1. Battery life 2. Responsivesness of finger print 3. Size 4. Free from just junk apps 5. Solid build 6. Free from glitches 7. camera Cons: feels little heavy but when you hold it you feel you are holding something very solid quality built product
customer_reviews.author: Rasheed Mohammed Khan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: Pros: •Great camera •Great performance •Fast fingerprint sensor with added features such as 3 shortcuts to turn on flashlight, open camera and/or open your​ favorite app. Also fingerprint sensor can be used to draw down notification panel •Great value for money •Really good design •Cons: Very weak speaker The price of this phone e fluctuates alot on Amazon, got it for $260 + $15 tax so I advise to watch the cost daily, price may vary for each color.
customer_reviews.author: maria m.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone for under $500.
customer_reviews.text: You won't regret in any manner after buying this phone. I purchased this phone for #319.99 and really you can't get anything this great for your money. It's amazing fast, the camera is superb and man it looks fabulous, though you have to use a case because of it's glass back. I got the update for Android 7.0 and EMUI 5.0 and there is no a single issue with the phone that i can say.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very well buid with lots of bugs. Just elegant looking and great camera.
customer_reviews.text: The phone feels silk and expensive, but has a few annoying bugs. First it will just answer a phone call for you without you even knowing. Takes great pic, tho. Also I was having battery issue not even a year in. Like batter will say 28% and then 2 minutes later phone shuts down because of "low" battery. Etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price. Comes with high end specs for half the price. After two weeks, I am loving this phone. The only negative thing I can say about this phone is the speaker. It is very low compared to other phones.
customer_reviews.author: J Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Terrific phone at $299
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I wasn't crazy about the OS but when it updated to 5 it was very nice. it feels as fast as my OnePlus 3T and has great battery life. I am a small man and like to carry it in my pocket. It is the perfect size. The finger print sensor works very quickly every time. I am a big fan of OnePlus (have owned one of very model they have made) but at $299 from Amazon, I like this as well as the 3T. The only issue I have is I cannot figure out how to move apps to my SD card...
customer_reviews.author: gordon

customer_reviews.title: Garbage phone, so many issues
customer_reviews.text: I've had way too many issues so I'll list some of what I experienced; Screen dims when opening web browser, audio lags, wifi drops in and out randomly, Bluetooth can crash phone and when it does "work" it lags and doesn't auto connect, texting apps don't seem to work well on Huawei phones as a rule apparently, call quality is terrible, or so I am told all the time and the ultra battery saver doesn't allow for screen brightness adjustment, instead it blares its blue light screen at max, which is both annoying on it's own but also it could save that much more battery.
customer_reviews.author: Anne You

customer_reviews.title: Great service at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service, phone is working great for me so far and will definitely get in touch with the seller if any problems occur :) Nice to see folks giving good service for a nice budget as well normally it's one or the other
customer_reviews.author: Earl Blueberry

customer_reviews.title: Horrible software support and hardware support.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. What a dumpster fire of a device! Software support is atrocious. Hardware repairs take forever. Support WILL hang up on you multiple times. They don't stand by their product at all.
customer_reviews.author: riddler

customer_reviews.title: Great product with good price
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Great price and perfect for day to day usage, battery lasted much longer than I expected. I have only charged it twice for the first 5-6 days of usage, initial charge then a total power charge on day 3 (still with 15% battery left). UI needs a little time to get used to, but overall a great budget phone. Will be waiting for the Android N update, which was announced right after I started using this phone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Au

customer_reviews.title: Works great, is responsive
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this phone for about 6 months now. Works great, is responsive, has loads of memory, and takes better pics than my husband's moto G5. I've never had a problem with the fingerprint feature either.
customer_reviews.author: C.E.L.H.G.

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about a month now. I previously had an honor 5x, which was super slow, buggy and had poor battery life. The honor 8x is definitely an improvement. It's faster, a little slimmer. It looks BEAUTIFUL with the glass back. The battery life is pretty decent, and the fast charger it comes with really does charge the phone quickly. The only negative is that the camera quality is not what I was hoping it would be
customer_reviews.author: VNica

customer_reviews.title: Fast working phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome. It's speed is fast and the touch screen is very responsive. I had a previous Huawei phone but it lacked the internal memory, in which this has 64gb(about 45 to 50 of it was freed up due to phone programs). I got this phone to use for everyday duties, including using it to fly my DJI drones( spark and mavic pro). So the DJI go 4 app works well. Overall I am very pleased to have purchased this phone. Next phone upgrade it will be another Huawei phone. The phone is absolutely stunning in color(saphire blue). But is slick do I suggest a good case.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: great and fast mid range android phone
customer_reviews.text: great and fast mid range android phone. works flawlessly with great battery life. USB-C is also a plus nd for the price well worth it. On the software side EMUI is more akin to IOS than android with respect to layout. Has its appeal tho. One bug however is the fact that the screen auto dims once chrome browser is opened up. Cant find a solution to it yet expect use a different launcher with just delays the screen dim
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Castor

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone! It has great features and is fast enough for me. Screen is decent and battery life is good. I purchased my used but it was like new. The only downside is that it's one slippery sucker. It's just seems to slip off everything. I advise that you buy a case as soon as you can, otherwise you will be picking it up off the floor cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Fionn MacCool

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone for the price, Easy to Scratch, Slippery
customer_reviews.text: This phone is wonderful. A definite upgrade to my previous phone. My only issue with it is how slippery it is, and also watch out for scratches. The glass on the back and material on the front does scratch easily. I recommend a shock proof phone case (to my knowledge there are not nice water proof cases for Huawei phones), and a 9H Sapphire screen protector is a nice addition. Make sure the case is lipped so it is raised around the front and the fingerprint pad/cameras on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone just don't use chrome on it
customer_reviews.text: I was having a problem with the phone freezing and jumping to new sights, I thought it was the phone turned out it was chrome once I turned it off no more problems. Work like it used to when I first got it,glad I stuck with it till I figured it out. Now I use Fox and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad out weighing the good 😟
customer_reviews.text: Having serious connectivity issues ,phone cannot maintain 4g for long periods ,it falls to edge too frequently. The SAR reading is also way too high. Even in typing this review the phone hung up
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Honor 8 for about a year now and I love it. Perfect size, not too small and not too big. I've never had any problems with it. T-mobile is my carrier. I have a flexible plastic/rubbery case and a tempered glass screen protector. I've cracked the protector 3 times, but not the phone's screen. If I had to get a new phone I'd get the exact same one.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid from CoHi, DC

customer_reviews.title: 0 Stars?
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the warranty runs out, your battery will begin dying on 30% or more power. This is a battery issue but, since the phone is out of warranty, Honor does not stand behind their products. BEWARE! As soon as the warranty is out, prepare to have to buy a new phone because they will not stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: nebbyKnezzar

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a phone. If you have a problem with the Huawei interface, just tweak it to your own liking
customer_reviews.text: You're getting an amazingly decent phone for $300. Most of the complaints I've seen have been about the EMUI, but you can tweak androids so much that if you have a problem with the way it looks/functions, just look stuff up and make the phone yours. So far, I've tweaked mine the way I like it, and everything works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Wez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Broken
customer_reviews.text: Brought in August, lasted until March. On first sight I thought this was a great phone. Eventually it started to just randomly turn off, reset and drain all battery! I contacted Huawei and the response was 'we believe you but there's nothing we can do' . Buy cheap you buy twice, stick with Samsung or Apple, this looks good but is a cheap and nasty alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Huawei with the Honor!
customer_reviews.text: I've been through maybe 4 phones in the last 7 years and the Honor 8 takes top billing! I am in love with this phone! Bought a BLU Life One in 2015, loved it initially until the battery life went downhill. Was looking a replacement, when some recommended I try an Honor phone. Now I wasnt gonns go buy Galaxy S8 or an IPhone, so I thought, why not? I am not disapointed at all. Great phone for the value. Had to make tweaks to my liking (Andriod user). But a wonderful Phone! Review to be updated after I thoroughly test the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Addison Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible service with no warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible service, 5 weeks after receiving the phone, the battery overheated to the point that it deformed the cover, split the edge of the phone and the screen lost its sharpness, after requesting help, I receive an email telling me that the time for the Warranty had expired. that is, so what they call (US Warranty) is the same as 30 days return policy,so in another words NO WARRANTY. The best solution that I got was a 15% off of my purchase after paying almost 100$ for a phone that only work 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: But this one is much more powerful and I really like it. It is real slippery though
customer_reviews.text: I'm a subcontractor so for awhile now I've been using two phones. One for personal and one for work. I use this one for my work phone which replaced the Honor 5. The Honor 5 was wider and had a bigger screen. But this one is much more powerful and I really like it. It is real slippery though. Definitely put a case or skin on it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Numina

customer_reviews.title: ... for and a $1000 would be 3 times as good as a $300 phone
customer_reviews.text: There was a time when I believed that you got what you paid for and a $1000 would be 3 times as good as a $300 phone. Not anymore. The Honor 8 simply does everything, and it does it well. If I have to be picky, OIS on the camera would have been nice, but it still takes great shots. I didn't like the stock launcher either, but the first thing I do with every phone is install Nova launcher anyways. The Honor 8 would be a great deal at twice the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: works great so far
customer_reviews.text: works great so far, is fast. only time will tell. IMPORTANT NOTE it's not a necessity to buy the bundle. the pone does come with quick charge and its cable.
customer_reviews.author: SuperSaiyanFui

customer_reviews.title: Huawei for life! 💜
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is clear and bass is pretty balanced just wish it got a bit louder. Everything else is great. Had this phone for a year now and its pretty dang rugged!
customer_reviews.author: tounchin

customer_reviews.title: Great value phone that doesn't feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace the phone within first month because screen got cracked (without being dropped or smashed). Was happy that Amazon did the exchange. Replacement device working great for my son.
customer_reviews.author: beameup

customer_reviews.title: Talk about Bang for your Buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Amazing! This phone, the look, the feel, the speed, the camera, the sound is top notch! The camera, OMG the camera, I don't have the words to describe the amazing quality and detail. Charges super fast and it doesn't get hot or even warm while gaming(and charging at the same time. It did get hot while updating to Android 7 and charging at the same time, but just that one time). Overall a great buy! 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: Rogene Roper

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for 3 years. I have really buttery fingers, so I drop things a lot. This phone survived for 3 years. A record for me. The camera is amazing. I love this camera better than newer Huawei phone cameras. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone as a replacement for my iPhone 6. Its performance is great, good processing speed and great graphic. However, a serious flaw with the phone I got was its horrible battery, which died simply after watching Youtube videos for just barely above an hour. And the battery indicator was misleading also. After the phone shut down and said it ran out of power, when I plugged it in about 5 minutes later, it showed 50%. 50%, and it died.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen Bui

customer_reviews.title: Kolbi ICE
customer_reviews.text: Got it for 260 bucks in black friday. Great phone for the price, works great in Costa Rica(Kolbi ICE).
customer_reviews.author: Isaac B.

customer_reviews.title: this phone is amazing. It's fast
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid (Amazon had it on sale for $269.99), this phone is amazing. It's fast, has great connection, battery lasts well enough, screen brightness can be changed to what's needed, etc. Camera is decent but I use a DSLR as a main shooter anyway. Pretty happy with this phone, especially after having used Windows Phones the past four years.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Was okay for awhile
customer_reviews.text: This is just an overall amazing device. Came quickly and is powerful as any phone costing 3X as much. At this price it makes OnePlus devices seems stupidly overpriced. Edit: Worked for about a year, then a software update bricked it. Factory reset didn't help. Will not be buying another phone from this company. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Robux

customer_reviews.title: Great photos, crappy battery, worse customer service
customer_reviews.text: Like so many others, my battery starting acting up right after the one year mark. This seems to be a known issue, bu the company won't do anything for you if you get a dud battery. They apologize then expect you to pay $131 to get the battery replaced???? Skip this model!!!
customer_reviews.author: Threelumpsofsugar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is beautiful. All the bells and whistles of "flagship" devices at half the cost. Picture quality is top notch, NFC is a breeze. Even includes IR blaster to control my home devices. There is no lag and the phone was updated to Android 7.0 as soon as I turned it on. As for the seller, since I do not have any issues with the phone, I have not had to contact them. Phone came in timely manner and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Amarille

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Bought Like New from Amazon Warehouse. Arrived brand new. Saved me a bit of money. White was okay. Wished I had picked a different color. Super fast, no lagging with apps. Takes great looking pictures. Battery last longer than my previous phone.
customer_reviews.author: 2damax

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, performance is good
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, performance is good, the battery life is decent, the screen is nice and vibrant and the fingerprint scanner works great. You get also ir blaster which is nice addition. The speaker is not the best in the market but the 3.5 mm port produce a great sound. For this price, can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: gamla77

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great phone! Compared to my last phone, (oneplus one) its faster, no lag, Bluetooth much improved, LTE and WiFi connectivity better. Audio quality is the only downside in direct comparison. Music isn't as detailed but probably fine for most.
customer_reviews.author: Garry J. Iman

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd Honor 8
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! I've owned one for a while, and I really like it. Ordered another for my girlfriend since she was due for an upgrade. She is also very pleased. Great screen, great camera, great performance. Very nice looking as well with the glass back. I recommend a case though... The screen and glass back slide off everything very easily.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best android phone I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best android phone I've ever had. I used to have an HTC M8. This thing is amazing, and for the fraction of the price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ged

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies when taking pics 😟
customer_reviews.text: It's not the phone it's the phone I was sent by this seller , the battery dies when I use the camera Everytime 😟 & I love taking pics Other than that love this phone Very small sleek & pretty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery issues
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this phone. After 1 year, the battery expanded because it got expired! The back side kind of came of because of that. Can you believe you pay more than $350 and it just works for one year?! The look is good. but I won't buy Huawei anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY WOULD RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great, it's very stylish made of glass and very attractive to the eye. Camera great and a great proce.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone so far. I received the 64GB model. This is a snappy little phone. Hard to believe it is almost 2 years old. I will update as I spend more time with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ray G.Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: So far this phone is amazing, especially for the price. Build quality is great, speed and performance is great. Only real complaints are that the back is very slippery, and the UI isn't great. But both of those can be remedied with acase and a launcher. Otherwise this is a fantastic phone, even a year and a half after it launched.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Daken

customer_reviews.title: My Black Honor 8 so far
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone... Come as advertised. It is very responsive and comes with Android 6.0 and Emotion UI 4.1 off the box. I upgraded it to Android 7.0 and Emotion UI 5.0. The picture quality is great but the video is slightly blur when i compared it to my Honor 6.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jideonwo

customer_reviews.title: Aside from the downgrade in phone quality I have been very happy with the speed and reliability of the device
customer_reviews.text: After cracking the screen of 3 different GS7E phones I decided I am not responsible enough for a flagship phone and ordered this. Aside from the downgrade in phone quality I have been very happy with the speed and reliability of the device. Plus if (when) I break it I won't cry so hard.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Beats Apple and Samsung hand downs, even if Apple and Samsung phones are at similar price range I would still buy Huawei
customer_reviews.author: Zaoliyik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smart phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent unlocked phone for the price. I wanted an unlocked phone but didn't want to spend too much. I am very pleasantly surprised with its speed, functionality, and features. I have always bought Samsung in the past, now Huawei has just gotten a new fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great Transition from Mate 2 phone
customer_reviews.text: I came to the Honor 8 from a Ascend Mate 2 which I loved but after a few years I decided I wanted to go smaller, The Honor 8 is so similar to the Mate 2 that it was a smooth transition. Love it, and I love the fingerprint recognition feature.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!  Excellent camera!
customer_reviews.text: Loving the phone so far. Still adjusting to all the OS and software features but all positive. I had an old iPhone and am enjoying the faster speed of this phone at a fraction of the cost of a new iPhone) Downloading new apps via Google Play is faster than with iTunes. The phone takes excellent, high qualuty photos. You can review camera comparisions at Gsmarenacom Battery life is acceptable, 1.5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Lon D Kaufmann

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing device, finger print sensor is fast and responsive. A 3000 mah battery with different power saving functions. The screen is a 1080 and not an amoled display, but the screen is beautiful. I think it's the hybrid son of the galaxy s7 and the iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnJohn

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance Indeed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for two weeks now and am extremely pleased with it. Sleek glass design. Performance is great. There seemed to initially be a warming issue with it which disappeared when I did the upgrade to Android 7 and EMUS 5.01. The seller was great with a timely delivery as promised. I had checked multiple benchmarks and reviews before purchasing and this phone is well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Phone with Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great looking phone with great camera, came with gift box and a case. Not the best but fairly decent specs and price point. Hopefully it will support T-Mobile Wifi calling soon.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone i ever had! Highlights * Finger print sensor * Standby * Very strict about which apps are running in background * Phone overall feel * Camera is very good Lowlights * little slippery so you have to be careful not to drop it * How to add app exceptions on background was not clear
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Coming from an HTC One M8, the Honor 8 totally blows the M8 away. Best phone I've ever owned. I'm not interested in paying $500 or more for a phone that I know I will break one day. That's why iPhones aren't worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brovahkiin

customer_reviews.title: Switched from an iPhone 6 and couldn't be more happy with this phone
customer_reviews.text: Switched from an iPhone 6 and couldn't be more happy with this phone. Fast, powerful, very sleek eye catching design and the IR blaster was something that I didn't know I needed until I got it. Controlling my TV, Xbox, Surround Sound, DVD player with my phone is super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Some Review Guy

customer_reviews.title: I've used Iphone and Samsung and honestly I really like this phone better
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Huawei phone. I've used Iphone and Samsung and honestly I really like this phone better. I jump right in and felt at home with the interface which is very easy to use. The speed was surprisingly fast and the camera takes great pictures. For the price for a unlocked phone can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This phone has been awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Want all the style of the latest phones for a quarter of the price? This is the answer, the truth, the alpha and the omega! At a quarter the price of some new flagship phones, this baby just gets the job done. And if you're into saving a buck, check out mint sim and you can pay $15/mo for 2gb of 4g LTE. This phone has been awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Renkey

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone for such price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone for such price! I use it already for more than a year. It has a great camera and it is really beautiful from the back (though no one can see it cause I put the case on it)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic phone, i really dont have any negative impressions of the phone. Great camera, great battery, speedy fast, multitasking is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! I have Samsung Galaxy S5 and bought this as the second phone. I now use it as my primary phone. Buy the case 100%, or it will slide off any surface! :)
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Phone came in perfect condition despite being used, came at a great price, phone is great looking, fast, has great battery life and tons of features. I couldn't ask much more of a phone.(I've owned an ASUS Zenfone 2, OnePlus One, Nokia Lumia 1020 and I phone 4s. And the honor 8 feels like another solid entry with a lot up it's sleeve, can't wait for Oreo!)
customer_reviews.author: Danny Mendez

customer_reviews.title: In love with Huawei
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife and at first she was a die hard Samsung fan. But due to all the fire fiasco she decided to give another phone a shot. She was not disappointed and thinks that this is her favorite phone she's had.
customer_reviews.author: BIGSAMDA1ST

customer_reviews.title: However the phone a awesome! I like design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone around 1 month ago (black, 32 Gb). I haven't had phones from Huawei before and was a bit skeptical. However the phone a awesome! I like design, it is so cool. Display is great and phone performance is good as well. And this is just for ~ 300$. I wish I've bought version with 64 Gb RAM, since a hope that I'll use this phone for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: Like there WiFi calling features it something like that
customer_reviews.text: The only thing about buying unlocked phones is not having the extra perks on att Verizon or TMobile. Like there WiFi calling features it something like that. But they don't have all the bloatware either. So a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Willard family

customer_reviews.title: Though the product functions fine without it
customer_reviews.text: The Gyroscope within the phone has malfunctioned since day one. Though the product functions fine without it, I paid for a new and fully functional phone and that is not what was received.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Replaced an iPhone 6 with this
customer_reviews.text: My step daughter bought this to replace her aging iPhone 6. She is more than happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M. Moran

customer_reviews.title: awesome dual lens camera
customer_reviews.text: Screen is bright and crisp, awesome dual lens camera, battery life is great, and it's super snappy. What else can you ask for this price? I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, takes amazing photos. My first non-apple and I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Falter

customer_reviews.title: Battery problems
customer_reviews.text: Had battery problems from the beginning. I wanted to love this phone, the camera is great, all functions are fine besides it being totally unreliable. It randomly dies, regardless of the battery reading.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Loving it! I'm so glad that switch from iPhone 5. It's fast and the screen is very good. Plus, the fast charging is amazing! My carrier is ATT and switching just swap a new sim card, and I'm good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: After 1 year of use... Amazing experience!
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year using this smartphone I can say now it is great and i love it. I'm writing this review with it and the phone looks like a new one working like the first day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: I was not sure if it's a good idea to buy a phone online
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if it's a good idea to buy a phone online, but I am glad the phone works no problem at all. Now I wonder why I spent so much money before to get big name phones through cell phone company and they worked just like this one, twice the price!!! The look is slick. In fact it looks way over its face value and feels good in my hand. It's thin, not too light and not too heavy. Screen looks good too. Everything is clear and sharp and vibrant. It does what a modern start phone is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Hellobaby

customer_reviews.title: Honor 8 wonderful phone especially for price.
customer_reviews.text: It's better than I expected, I am coming from iPhone 6 plus. It has a premium construction feel to it the screen looks wonderful. It is very responsive. The changes honor made to Android I like because I am use to iOS they included a spotlight like search.
customer_reviews.author: Chris brookshire

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: A very nice phone. I was using the Honor 5x but I was looking for a little more storage. The 5x was such a good phone, that I decided to stay with the honor brand and get the honor 8. This phone is fast and smooth. The glass back is very nice looking. Coming from the 5x, there was no learning curve around EMUI. I actually really like it and there are many features I use. The only con is not being able to move apps to the sd card, hopefully there is a fix coming for this. I have plenty of space on my phone now, but it could become an issue in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Zingmaster

customer_reviews.title: Still love it after 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is fast and I LOVE the fingerprint access that doubles as a button for accessing 3 different apps that you choose. I made one my camera. I never miss a photo anymore. It is so fast. Many of the photos also look amazing. Back looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I had a galaxy s6 prior and this phone works way better.
customer_reviews.author: Kameron Thayne

customer_reviews.title: I thought the battery life of the Honor 8 would be better, but no
customer_reviews.text: Had a OnePlus 2 before. I thought the battery life of the Honor 8 would be better, but no... I still need to recharge mid day, which is quite disappointed. Also, I expected the phone to be dual sim. The sim tray is, but the phone isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Gene H.

product_meta.title: Huawei Honor 8 Unlocked Smartphone 32 GB Dual Camera - US Warranty (Midnight Black)
product_meta.description: Size:32GB| Style:Phone Only| Color:Midnight BlackYou have the power to push culture forward. That’s why Honor created a phone for you - the new Honor 8. It’s the smartphone that opens your eyes to a world of possibilities. The innovative bionic 12MP dual lenses of the Honor 8 are your eyes to the world. One lens allows for rich color and the other lens is monochrome to give you more light and increased sharpness. Together they help you capture crisper, more detailed photos day and night. Plus, the fusion focus technology of laser, depth, and contrast helps you take the best pictures-even under the most challenging conditions. The premium, slick body of the Honor 8 is made with heavy dual glass-front and back. Its aluminum alloy, 15-layer craftsmanship, and light-catching glass finish makes you stand out from the crowd. Supported by Smart Power 4.0, the Honor 8 has maximum long-lasting battery life that lasts all day and fast-charging technology to reach 47% power in just 30 minutes. So when you’re out there changing the world, Honor 8 has you covered-with up to 10 hours of nonstop video playback and a speedy recharge. The Honor 8: Beautiful design, top-flight specs, game-changing camera technology, and maximum power. Honor 8 - Eyes to the World.
feature_bullets: Innovative bionic 12MP dual lenses allow you to capture crisper, more detailed photos
Wide aperture mode allows you to redefine the focus even after the photo has been taken
Secure fingerprint access that can unlock your Honor 8 as fast as 0.4 seconds
Smart Power 4.0: 1.77 day battery life for normal usage and fast-charging technology to reach 50% charge in just 30 minutes
As seen in Marvel's Doctor Strange. Please Note: Kindly refer the User Guide before use.
